divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving in my truck heading east on Interstate 8 just coming off Interstate 10 by Casa Grande and I noticed just above me to my right what I thought was a plane flying low. When I got closer I noticed that it was not moving or it was moving very slow. As I kept driving I ended up almost right underneath the object. I didn't really have a chance to stop and get a good look or listen for any sound it was making, but it had three lights that made a triangle shape on the bottom. I lost sight of the object as I kept driving so I don't know how long it stayed there.
Summary: I was driving on I -8 and looked up at what i thought was a plane going to land, but when i got closer i noticed the lights were not flashing and the object was actually not moving.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Casa Grande
There were no other sightings in Casa Grande on or around January 11th 2012
